constructor.details: Sets the contract deployer as the initial owner

deployPosition(address,address).custom:security: This function should only be called by the factory contract
deployPosition(address,address).details: This function creates a new Position instance with the provided parameters. Only the factory contract should call this function to ensure proper pool management. Requirements: - _lendingPool must be a valid lending pool contract address - _user must be a valid user address

params._lendingPool: The address of the lending pool contract

returns._0: The address of the newly deployed Position contract

setOwner(address).custom:security: Consider using a two-step ownership transfer pattern for production
setOwner(address).details: Only the current owner can transfer ownership to a new address Requirements: - Caller must be the current owner - _owner should be a valid address (non-zero for safety, though not enforced)

params._owner: The address of the new owner

deployPosition(address,address).notice: Deploys a new Position contract with specified parameters

owner().notice: The address of the contract owner who has administrative privileges

setOwner(address).notice: Updates the owner address of the contract
